quoteText: Registered Users have the right to use the products, services and functionality provided by Brainly and the content and information published on the Brainly Services only within their own needs, for non-commercial purposes.
title: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.

tosdr.case: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.
tosdr.tldr: The Terms of Use (in Part A, applicable to users unless you are in Europe) state that, "Registered Users have the right to use the products, services and functionality provided by Brainly and the content and information published on the Brainly Services only within their own needs, for non-commercial purposes."
